participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and determined, she loves to participate in school activities and is focused on her future.
participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and excited, she is thrilled about her new home and the upcoming arrival of her triplets.
participant_2.background: i am expecting triplets in three months. i just moved into my first home. i work at a school. a already have a step children.
